message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our unique and valuable product to you. It's an exceptional opportunity that aligns well with your needs and interests. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $12,000 for the product. This offer is designed to ensure you receive a fair value while allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. I believe this price reflects the quality and benefits of the product, making it a win-win situation for both of us. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
